entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
